name: Shrine of Ocula
description:
Deep in the depths of an underground cave system over what seems to be an inactive volcano, an investigator of the truly strange and unearthly at last finds the key to an ages-old mystery in the hidden Shrine of the Ocula. But elsewhere in the caves, a greater danger lurks….

This game was made in 48 hours for ACM Studio at UCLA's Studio Snowjam, for the theme "Toasty". 

Controls: 

WASD to move the player

Space to interact

LShift to peek around corners 

I to open backpack

Developers:

Programming - Johnny Wan, Cole Strain, Kayla Valentekovic

Art - Koby Wong, Zoë Chavez, Kayla Valentekovic

Music - Cathy Zhang
